channel.title: How to make npc talk more
channel.description: hiya i have my npc but he says his speach like every 20min how i make it so like every 30secs?

item.title: How to make npc talk more
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Ok Search your NPC in npchandler.java or wherever you added that NPC to Talk:

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcid) { if (misc.random2(talktime) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "text"; } }

Replace the talktime from above to everytime you want it to chant that.

Example:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to RichScape, Have a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!"; } }

Which means, Npc 1552 (santa) will chant the text every 30 seconds.
